metadata.name: Green Backed Heron
metadata.description:
This artwork is part of NVillustration's 1000 days of miniature art series. This photographic style is iconic to NVillustration. The artwork is made of paper and shot in real water body to display "Green backed Heron" hunting in water. 

The first buyer will receive the NFT , the Original artwork and a Archival Print on 100% Cotton Rag Hahnemuhle 200 GSM paper.

This auction will be carbon neutral with a percentage going towards forest conservation projects & emerging technologies that capture carbon through Aerial.
